visits.text: Flight Santiago → Temuco then road Temuco → Pucón
View of Volcán Villarrica (from the city and lake)
Ojos del Caburgua (waterfalls and blue lagoon)
Marimán Rapids (Trancura River, viewpoint)
Caburgua Lake Beach (black volcanic sand)
Huerquehue National Park (araucaria forests, lagoon trails)
Free day in Pucón (stroll and beach)

activities.text: Free time: casino, artisan cafés, local microbreweries
Walk along the lakefront with views of Osorno & Calbuco volcanoes
Short interpretive hike around the lava flows
Observation of the Chiloé coastline (marine fauna and landscapes)
Check-in and short walk in downtown Punta Arenas (Plaza Muñoz Gamero)

days_plan.itin_title: Chile's Epic Landscapes: A Road Trip from the Atacama Desert to Patagonian Glaciers

visits.text: Excursion to the Strait of Magellan: Isla Magdalena (Magellanic penguin colony)
Zodiac descent on Río Serrano (panoramas of the Southern Ice Field)
Hike to Serrano Glacier front (Bernardo O'Higgins Park)

activities.text: Bus Punta Arenas → Puerto Natales (late afternoon)
Navigation on Fiordo Última Esperanza to Puerto Natales

days_plan.itin_title: Chile's Epic Landscapes: A Road Trip from the Atacama Desert to Patagonian Glaciers
Chile's Epic Landscapes: A Road Trip from the Atacama Desert to Patagonian Glaciers

visits.text: Arrival in Puerto Varas (City of Roses) on the shores of Lake Llanquihue
Ensenada (shore of Llanquihue)
Petrohué Falls (Vicente Pérez Rosales Park)
Scenic route to Osorno volcano ski center (viewpoints)
Crossing of Chacao channel to Chiloé Island
Castro: stilt houses and UNESCO-listed wooden churches

activities.text: Bus Punta Arenas → Puerto Natales (late afternoon)
Lunch en route in the park (box-lunch type)
Wildlife observation (guanacos, rheas) and viewpoints
Navigation on Fiordo Última Esperanza to Puerto Natales

days_plan.itin_title: Chile's Epic Landscapes: A Road Trip from the Atacama Desert to Patagonian Glaciers

activities.text: Free stroll at the end of the day in Santiago (last shopping)
Vol prochaine étape

days_plan.itin_title: Chile's Epic Landscapes: A Road Trip from the Atacama Desert to Patagonian Glaciers

visits.text: Transfer Calama → San Pedro de Atacama via Domeyko mountain range
Valle de la Luna: amphitheater and dunes
Miscanti and Miñiques lagoons (altiplano)
Salar de Atacama: Laguna Chaxa (National Flamingo Reserve)
Village of Toconao: San Lucas church & bell tower
Geysers del Tatio (geothermal field at dawn)
Village of Machuca (Andean architecture)

activities.text: Flamingo observation (3 species) at the salt flat
Thermal bath at geothermal site (weather permitting)
Flight Calama → Santiago
Walk on Villarrica Lake beach (volcanic ash)

days_plan.itin_title: Chile's Epic Landscapes: A Road Trip from the Atacama Desert to Patagonian Glaciers

visits.text: Historic center of Santiago (Plaza de Armas, Cathedral, Palacio de la Real Audiencia)
La Moneda (esplanade and civic district)
Bellavista district (urban stroll)
Viña del Mar: Flower clock and waterfront (Avenida Perú)
Valparaíso: Paseo Atkinson & Paseo Yugoslavo (historic hills)
Plaza Sotomayor and Muelle Prat (historic port)
Maipo Valley: vineyard (visit to cellars and vineyards in Pirque)
Free time according to flight schedule (urban parks or museums of choice)

activities.text: Ascent to Cerro Santa Lucía (urban viewpoint)
Scenic route Santiago ↔ Valparaíso/Viña (via Curacaví & Casablanca valleys)
Maipo wine tasting
Sunset over the Valley of the Moon (Las Tres Marías)
Free stroll at the end of the day in Santiago (last shopping)
Vol prochaine étape

days_plan.itin_title: Chile's Epic Landscapes: A Road Trip from the Atacama Desert to Patagonian Glaciers

visits.text: Hierbas Buenas: petroglyphs
Valle del Arcoíris (multicolored minerals)
Río Grande hamlet (colonial architecture)

activities.text: Los Pozones Hot Springs (outdoor hot baths)
Possible swimming in a park lagoon (weather permitting)

days_plan.itin_title: Chile's Epic Landscapes: A Road Trip from the Atacama Desert to Patagonian Glaciers

visits.text: Cueva del Milodón (paleontological site)
Torres del Paine National Park: Nordenskjöld Lake & Pehoé Lake
Salto Grande (waterfall)
Viewpoint at Grey Glacier front (from the peninsula or access trail)
Free hiking day in Torres del Paine (trail of choice)

activities.text: Lunch en route in the park (box-lunch type)
Wildlife observation (guanacos, rheas) and viewpoints
